Question: Safee CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Safee CES 2024

Safee Case

- Uses MagSafe technology to attach to the back of an iPhone
- Features a 130-decibel alarm and emergency contact sharing
- Records can be accessed from the application later as legal evidence
- Winner of CES Innovation Award in 2023 in the Human Security Category
- Retails starting at €55
Summary_cn:
Safee CES 2024

Safee保护套

- 采用MagSafe技术与iPhone背部相连接
- 配备130分贝的警报和紧急联系人共享功能
- 录音可以后续通过应用程序访问作为法律证据
- 2023年CES创新奖获得者，荣获人类安全类别奖项
- 零售价从55欧元起
